sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing an ace of spades from a standard deck of 52 playing cards?
message_2:
There is only one ace of spades in a standard deck of 52 playing cards. Therefore, the probability of drawing an ace of spades is 1 out of 52, which can be expressed as a fraction, decimal, or percentage:

Fraction: 1/52
Decimal: 0.01923 (rounded to 5 decimal places)
Percentage: 1.923% (rounded to 3 decimal places)
